collection:
This
Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal
information.

When you add a Google account to our system, we collect the necessary
information to facilitate this process.

This data is limited to your Google
account details necessary for the integration, such as your email address.

We
do not collect any other personal data unless you voluntarily provide it to
us.
sharing:
We do not share your personal data with any third parties, except as necessary
to provide our services, or as required by law.
